amendment.description: To prohibit the implementation of the "Rostenkowski Test" with respect to the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1141 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 82 - 11. Record Vote Number: 340.

action.text: Amendment SA 1141 proposed by Senator Jones to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6321-6322; text: CR S6321) To prohibit the implementation of the "Rostenkowski Test" with respect to the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund.
